summary: A bullied and demoralized gay student at an all-boys school uses a magical flower derived from Shakespeare's "A Midsummer Night's Dream' to turn many in his community gay, including a comely rugby player for himself.
cast: Tanner Cohen|Wendy Robie|Judy McLane|Zelda Williams|Jill Larson|Ricky Goldman|Nathaniel David Becker|Christian Stolte|David Darlow|Parker Croft|Brad Bukauskas|Reid Dawson|Alexander Aguilar|Yoni Solomon|Colleen Skemp|Waymon Arnette|Zach Gray|Julia Black|Peggy Roeder|Ora Jones|Annabel Armour|Ken Gasch|Adam Gauzza|Matthew McMunn|Walter Thon|Michael Hargrove|Martie Sanders|Dev Kennedy|Charin Alvarez|J.R. Rose|Paul M. Lisnek|Chris Blim|Aaron Golden|Mike Keeney|Nik Koulogeorge|Steve Mcquown|Holly Barrett|Anthony Brawner|Brent Allen Caputo|Diana Castrillon|Tony Domino|Sawyer Fortier|Nathan Geist|Sandy Gulliver|Michelle Higgins|Tim Krueger|Kyle Miller|PJ Samorian
title: Were the World Mine
